Uses of Class
gruppe.irc.MessageEvent

  • Packages that use MessageEvent 
    Package Description
    gruppe.irc.messageListeners
    This package contains the MessageListener interface that needs to be implemented by any listeners that is to be connected to the IRCConnection object.

    • Uses of MessageEvent in gruppe.irc.messageListeners

      Methods in gruppe.irc.messageListeners with parameters of type MessageEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PingListener.messageReceived(MessageEvent me)
      Method receives messages from IRCConnection object and checks if it is a PING request from the server.
      void MessageListener.messageReceived(MessageEvent me)
      Method to be called to notify the listener of a new message from the IRCConnection object.
      void GlobalMessageListener.messageReceived(MessageEvent me)
      Method to receive messages from the server and print them on standard output.
